page.title: 07LIFE IN LIVINGSTON
page.content: My name is Graeme Mearns. I have lived in{Livingston}for four years. I used to live in{Edinburgh.}The reason we moved out here was because of the violence caused by 'punks' and 'mods'. Not only that, my mum liked the houses and my dad had a job out here. There are more games and activities for children and adults in Livingston. For instance the B.M.X. track in Staunton Rise, where people can amuse themselves by trying to conquer the obstacles. There is also a pond where people can catch frogs and newts. On Monday there is a Family Night at the {James Young High School}where whole families can go and enjoy themselves with a variety of fun games. I enjoy living in Livingston better than I did in Edinburgh.
